about_the_game:
About the game
Dive into an exciting world of enchantment and discovery in our fantasy visual novel Beach Bitch. Immerse yourself in a unique narrative that combines whimsy and intrigue. Explore a hauntingly beautiful beach, following the journey of young girls who stumble upon an unlikely companion in their quest to find their way home.

Get ready for a romp through a world where fantasy meets hilarity and a dash of sauciness in "Beach Bitch." Dive into a visual novel that blends humor, adventure, and just a hint of naughty charm as you join Alice and Sophia on their escapades with a gangbang of scaly pirates.

Story

The beach waves caressed the sandy shore, inviting to swim in their embrace. Two girls, Alice and Sophia, strolled along the coast, enjoying the warm sand under their feet and the cool sea breeze. Their bright swimsuits accentuated their slender figures, and playful smiles lit up their faces, as if reflecting the sun's rays.

Passing by thickets of bushes, the girls noticed something unusual: an abandoned bar, as if lost in time. Its appearance was sad and simultaneously mysterious, as if hiding secrets of the past. Scattered tables and chairs seemed like ghosts of past cheerful evenings, and the sign with the name "Siren" evoked thoughts of mysterious stories hidden behind this name.

Features

  • Tail-ored Romance: Keep an eye out for sparks flying amidst the swaying palm trees and crashing waves. Will love bloom between our heroines and their scaly friends?

  • Sizzling Scenes: Uncover steamy encounters and cheeky moments as you delve deeper into the bonds between Alice, Sophia, and their newfound pirate pals. Just remember, things might get a little heated under the tropical sun.

  • Immersive Artwork: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals that bring the world of "Beach Bitch" to life. From serene sunsets to swashbuckling showdowns, every scene is a feast for the eyes, ensuring your adventure is as visually captivating as it is entertaining.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexual caracters, sexual acts, sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex.
It does not contains drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All characters are over the age of 18.
